column4: I'm having problem with java based programs (azureus), since i installed sun-j2sdk, so now i removed it and these programs still doesnt work, what can i do ??
you don't have to create a new profile
will that delete any of my stuff ? (bookmarks, cookies etc.)
no, just delete that "lock" file in that directory
dont know if you saw my last question, i got disconnected ..
nvm i got it working, thanks
but you got the file deleted?
should i report that as a bug in bugzilla or something?
I think that's not a bug
could you elaborate the thing to me?
